# Hoyrall Equipment
## Overview
***[[Hoyrall]] have access to the following equipment.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Hoyrall|hoyrall]] equipment introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Hoyrall Capblades]]
- [[Hoyrall Shellcracker]]
- [[Mating Vencegran]]
- [[Siktauryi]]
